{{disambig-two: Siriondil's rule was apparently uneventful. He had two children, [[Tarannon]] and [[Tarciryan]].<ref name="South"/>
He was succeeded by his illustrious son [[Tarannon Falastur]], the first of the four [[Ship-king
''Siriondil'' is [[Quenya]] for "River-friend". ''Sirion'' seems to refer to the [[Anduin]] rather than the river [[Sirion]] in [[Beleriand]] of old.
